#summary Method typeBasicInfoByTypeName details

= /typeBasicInfoByTypeName/(typeName) =

Item type basic information for given typeName.

== Attributes ==

|| icon || String ||
|| itemCategoryID || Number ||
|| itemTypeID || Number ||
|| name || String ||

== Examples ==

[http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/typeBasicInfoByTypeName/blah-blah typeBasicInfoByTypeName/blah-blah] (HTTP 400)

[http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/typeBasicInfoByTypeName/Tritanium typeBasicInfoByTypeName/Tritanium] (JSON)
{{{
{ "icon" : "06_14",
  "itemCategoryID" : 4,
  "itemTypeID" : 34,
  "name" : "Tritanium"
}
}}}

[http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/typeBasicInfoByTypeName/Tritanium typeBasicInfoByTypeName/Tritanium] (XML)
{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<invTypeBasicInfoDto>
  <icon>06_14</icon>
  <itemCategoryID>4</itemCategoryID>
  <itemTypeID>34</itemTypeID>
  <name>Tritanium</name>
</invTypeBasicInfoDto>
}}}
